name: German Beet Salad with Caraway Seeds
author: Naschkatze
summary: This is a traditional German beet salad with a simple apple cider vinegar dressing and caraway seeds. You can also make it with roasted beets, but in Germany the beets are usually boiled.
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon salt, or to taste
directions: Place beets in a saucepan and cover with water
Bring to a boil, cover, reduce heat, and simmer until beets can easily be pierced with a fork, about 45 minutes
Peel and slice beets; place into a large bowl
Combine apple cider vinegar, olive oil, sugar, salt, and pepper in a small bowl and pour over beets
Add caraway seeds and mix again
Allow to chill 2 hours before serving
